title: Endpoint Detection Response EDR
extract: A Definition of Endpoint Detection and Response. Gartner's Anton Chuvakin first coined the term Endpoint Threat Detection and Response (ETDR) in July 2013 to define “the tools primarily focused on detecting and investigating suspicious activities (and traces of such) other problems on hosts/endpoints.”Jan 3, 2019
